title: Bubble Machine
info: The Bubble Machine is a placed novelty mechanism that produces colorful bubble effects. Once placed, it continuously produces bubbles. It can be activated and deactivated via wire, but is always on by default when first placed. The bubbles are purely visual, have no functional effect, and can be produced infinitely at no cost. The Bubble Machine is purchased from the Party Girl for 4.
